item.trans: adj. 侦探的 n. 侦探 同义词:tec, hawkshaw detective inspected the room for fingerprints .侦探检查房间寻找指纹。
adj. 不可思议的；难以置信的；不能想象的；非凡的 同义词:remarkable, extraordinary, magic, mysterious, incredible But it is inconceivable , in today's world , that such an emergency would re - occur .但在当今世界，再次发生这类紧急情况是不可想象的。
n. 匕首，短剑 vt. 用剑刺 同义词:knife, stiletto The outlaw pulled out dagger and bade defiance to the policemen .那名歹徒拔出匕首，悍然与警察对抗。
n. 美德；优点；贞操；功效 同义词:asset, excellence, efficiency, morality A virtue of this plan is that it should help us find out .这项救援计划的一个优点就是，它应会有助于我们找到答案。
vi. 打，打击；罢工；敲，敲击；抓；打动；穿透 vt. 打，击；罢工；撞击，冲击；侵袭；打动；到达 n. 罢工；打击；殴打 同义词:grasp, beat upon, impact, beat upon, stroke, shock, hit, hiding He's struck by his father.他挨了父亲的打。
n. 存在；生命；本质；品格 adj. 存在的；现有的 同义词:presence, existence, entity, essence, personality, principle, visible, existent Caesar is no more.恺撒已不复存在了。
n. 存在；生命；本质；品格 adj. 存在的；现有的 Caesar is no more.恺撒已不复存在了。
adv. 最初，起初；本来 同义词:initially, essentially Originally , the brain is quite open .起初大脑是非常开放的。
adj. 好的；优良的；愉快的；虔诚的 n. 好处；善行；慷慨的行为 adv. 好 同义词:fine, Ok, great, religious, bright, benefit, plus, mercy, okey It is a good story . But look !这是一个很好的故事。但是看！

adj. 浅的；肤浅的 n. [地理] 浅滩 vt. 使变浅 vi. 变浅 同义词:low, flat, surface, bank, ford, decharge, shoaliness, shoal, shoal So this was a very shallow earthquake , which means it would tend to be more destructive .这次的地震是一个非常浅表的地震，也就意味着它将更具有破坏性。
n. 先见，远见；预见；深谋远虑 同义词:prescience, prevision I only wish someone had the foresight to film it .我只希望谁有先见之明，能预先把它拍下来。
n. 巡逻；巡逻队；侦察队 vt. 巡逻；巡查 vi. 巡逻；巡查 The army regularly patrol along the border.部队按时在边境巡逻。
n. 碗柜；食橱 同义词:dresser, spense He foraged about in the cupboard .他在碗橱里到处寻找食物。
n. 尊严；高贵 同义词:sanctity, nobility But he is a man of great dignity , superior talents and high ideals .但他是一个很有尊严的人，具有超人的才华和崇高的理想。

n. 报告；报道；成绩单 vt. 报告；报导；使报到 vi. 报告；报到；写报导 同义词:advisory, rept, cover, give notice to, message, inform of If there is something wrong with the machine,it should be reported at once to the engineer in charge.机器出了毛病，应立即报告主管工程师。
vi. 爬行；匍匐行进 vt. 爬行；缓慢地行进 n. 爬行；养鱼池；匍匐而行 同义词:creep, creep, aquarium A child learns to crawl before he learns to walk.小孩在学走路之前先学爬。
adv. 技术上；专门地；学术上；工艺上 同义词:specially, expressly Its auditors judged that if the transaction went ahead the company would become technically insolvent .该公司的审计师判断，如果交易成功，公司将会技术上破产。
n. 白天；日光；黎明；公开 同义词:morning, sunlight, publicity, open Let daylight dry your tears .让白天带走你的泪水。
n. [贸易] 囤积；贮藏；临时围墙 v. 贮藏（hoard的ing形式） 同义词:store, coemption, stowing Similarly , labour hoarding in France also comes at a cost .在法国相似的劳动力的临时存储也需要成本。
n. 拱廊；（内设投角子电子游戏机等的）游乐场；有拱廊的街道 vt. 使有拱廊 同义词:recreation ground, amusement parks Mike : Those slogans are fine for fancy stores , but not at the arcade .迈克：这些口号对于奇异幻想商铺不错，但是不是在光盘商铺。

vt. 给予；分配；测量 n. 边界；测量 同义词:afford, allow, extend, deliver, sound, boundary, measurement, border, survey KJV : For with what judgment ye judge, ye shall be judged : and with what measure ye mete , it shall be measured to you again.和合本：因为你们怎样论断人，也必怎样被论断；你们用什麽量器量给人，也必用什麽量器量给你们。
n. 大会；[法] 惯例；[计] 约定；[法] 协定；习俗 同义词:tradition, usage, institution, appointment, bond Have you been to that convention center before ?你以前去过那个会议中心吗？
adj. 局部的；偏爱的；不公平的 同义词:regional, local, unfair, topical But once again science gives at least partial credence to something that was once considered only a myth .但是科学至少再一次给了那些曾经被认为只是神话的东西一部分的信任。

n. 米；仪表；[计量] 公尺；韵律 vt. 用仪表测量 vi. 用表计量 同义词:rhythm, metre The presenter can use an additional set of tools such as Meeting Minder, Speaker Notes , Slide Navigator , and Slide Meter .演示者可以使用许多附加工具，例如会议记录、演讲者备注、幻灯片漫游，或幻灯片计时器。
vi. 保持；依然；留下；剩余；逗留；残存 n. 遗迹；剩余物，残骸 同义词:stop, keep up, debris, relic He remained in the hospital for a solid month.他在医院里住了整整一个月。
adv. 戏剧地；引人注目地 同义词:remarkably, markedly The mood in labor markets has shifted dramatically from just four year ago .刚刚过去的四年里，劳动力市场上的气氛就发生了巨变。
vi. 登陆，下车；上岸 vt. 使……登陆；使……上岸 同义词:land, go ashore to disembark passengers from the ferry让乘客下渡船
n. 信号；暗号；导火线 vt. 标志；用信号通知 adj. 显著的；作为信号的 vi. 发信号 同义词:high sign, alarm-word, mark, obvious, prominent, marked, noted, outstanding, semaphore to signal the headquarters向大本营发信号
n. 平台；月台，站台；坛；讲台 同义词:flatform, hathpace The reconfigurable software development platform technique is researched .研究了可重构软件开发平台技术。

adj. 组合的；各种各样的；混杂的 v. 把…分等级；把…归为一类（assort的过去分词） 同义词:various, combined Among the assorted education guarantees is that some pupils who fall behind will be able to get one-to- one catch-up tuition .为改善教育做出的五花八门的保证当中，也包含着对成绩落后的学生提供一对一的补习辅导。
vt. 系住；使停泊 n. 沼泽；荒野 同义词:bend on, wild, cienaga She moored her boat alongside ours.她把她的船停靠在我们船边。
n. 试验；审讯；努力；磨炼 adj. 试验的；审讯的 同义词:effort, hearing, pain, proof, experiment, testing As our engineer for the trial run will fly in tomorrow .明天我们参加试车的工程师就会乘飞机到达。
vt. 挤；紧握；勒索 vi. 压榨 n. 压榨；紧握；拥挤；佣金 同义词:force one's way, thread one's way, compression, commission, purchase to squeeze oneself into the lift挤进电梯
n. 训练；钻孔机；钻子；播种机 vi. 钻孔；训练 vt. 钻孔；训练；条播 同义词:training, discipline, bore a hole, counter sunk, discipline, coach to drill boulders for inserting dynamite在巨石上打眼以便装炸药
n. 反应，感应；反动，复古；反作用 同义词:response, behavior, induction, reception This reaction is conducted at high temperatures .这个反应是在高温下进行的。
vi. 复发；重现；采用；再来；循环；递归 同义词:relapse into, recrudesce If the swelling should recur, please take this medicine immediately.如果再出现肿胀症状，请立即服用这种药品。
vt. 使闪光；反射 n. 闪光，闪现；一瞬间 vi. 闪光，闪现；反射 adj. 闪光的，火速的 同义词:reflect, mirror, stroboflash, coruscation, reflect, flare light, shot, coruscant Lightning flashed across the sky.闪电闪过天空。
n. 电影；薄膜；胶卷；轻烟 vt. 在…上覆以薄膜；把…拍成电影 vi. 摄制电影；生薄膜；变得朦胧 同义词:movie, membrane, cinema, cinematograph Tears films her eyes.眼泪布满了她的双眼。
adj. 不会下沉的，不会沉底的 CAL : Waste of deck space as it is , on unsinkable ship !卡尔：在不沉之船上就是浪费甲板空间，。
n. 场面；情景；景象；事件 同义词:event, circumstance, occurrence, incident, matter rock music scene摇滚乐界
n. 照相机；摄影机 Hello . This is my new camera .你好，这是我的新照相机。
n. 激情；热情；酷爱；盛怒 同义词:flame, love, fire, warmth As a result , she created a new career and a new passion for herself .结果，她干出了一个新事业，为自己创造了一个新的激情。
n. 文明；文化 同义词:culture, kultur This simple experiment was not undoing the clock ; it was undoing civilization .这个简陋的实验并非在逆转时钟，而是在逆转文明。
n. 科学；技术；学科；理科 同义词:technology, mechanics, skill, knowledge, discipline He brought new energy to the science department .他为科学部门带来了新的能量。
adv. 以某种方法；莫明其妙地 同义词:one way or another, puzzlingly You'll grow up somehow.不管怎样，你总会长大的。
adj. 多变的；各式各样的；杂色的 v. 改变；使多样化（vary的过去式和过去分词形式） 同义词:shot, polytropical, changed I can vary the speed at will.我可以随意改变速度。
vt. 查阅；商量；向…请教 vi. 请教；商议；当顾问 同义词:look up, speak together, take advice, seek advice I have to consult the manager about the matter.关于这件事我得向经理请示一下。
n. 性能；绩效；表演；执行 同义词:property, capability, enforcement, execution, implementing Our music teacher will give us extra credit if we write a report on the performance .如果我们写一个表演的报告的话英语老师将会给我们额外的学分。
n. 下面；阴暗面 同义词:dark side, dark face Install the screw attaching the front of the end cap to the underside of the quarter panel.拉下舵手室外套，拆去连接末端端盖到前挡泥板的螺栓。
n. 责备；耻辱 vt. 责备；申斥 同义词:blame, thumbs-down, blame for, talk to The manager reproached the new salesgirl for her carelessness.经理斥责新来的女售货员工作上粗心大意。
n. 系列，连续；[电] 串联；级数；丛书 同义词:succession, progression For such a series it is usual to design a standard margin .对于这种系列图幅，通常是设计一种标准图廓。
vt. 说服；使确信，使信服 同义词:assure, reason, satisfy, argue He convinced me of the difficulty of the work.他使我确信这件工作的艰巨性。
adj. 海军的；军舰的 Would you like to go there for a spell as a naval observer ?你愿不愿意以海军观察员的身份到那里呆上一个时期？

adj. 基本的，根本的 n. 基本原理；基本原则 同义词:elementary, basic, essential, organic, primary, basic principle, ultimate, rationale Integration of theory with practice is one of the fundamental principles of Marxism .理论与实践的统一，是马克思主义的一个最基本的原则。
vi. 种田，务农；经营农场 n. 农场；农家；畜牧场 vt. 养殖；耕种；佃出（土地） 同义词:follow the plough, grange, steading, till, plant crops to farm 200 acres耕种200英亩土地
n. 干扰，冲突；干涉 同义词:conflict, disturbance, war, obstacle, collision In fact , depending on the geometry , wave interference can cause the signal to vanish altogether .事实上，在某些几何状况产生的波动干涉，也可能造成信号完全消失。
n. 杂乱，混乱 vt. 使凌乱；胡乱地填满 同义词:chaos, disorder, confusion, involvement, mix Newspapers and magazines cluttered the bedroom.卧室里到处都是报纸和杂志。
adj. 外国的；相异的，性质不同的；不相容的 n. 外国人，外侨；外星人 vt. 让渡，转让 同义词:foreign, external, foreigner, uitlander, transfer, negotiate Jim is an alien in this film .吉姆在这部电影里是个外星人。
n. 摄影师；照相师 同义词:cameraman, lensman It looks like you 're quite a photographer .看来你是一个相当不错的摄影师。

adj. [物] 物理的；身体的；物质的 n. 体格检查 同义词:personal, material, natural, medical examination, check-up The World Health Organization says , there are 3 major causes : tobacco use , physical inactivity and an unhealthy diet .世界卫生组织说，有3个主要原因：烟草使用，身体不活动和一个不健康的节食。
vt. 推进；驱使；激励；驱策 同义词:stimulate, power A sailing boat is propelled by wind.帆船是由风力推进的。
adj. 鉴定的；[核] 临界的；批评的，爱挑剔的；危险的；决定性的；评论的 同义词:dangerous, crucial, final, decisive, marginal The imagination imitates . It is the critical spirit that create .想象是模仿，批判的精神才具有创造力。
adj. 谦虚的，谦逊的；适度的；端庄的；羞怯的 同义词:odest, inobtrusive These measures are a modest step in the right direction .这些措施只不过是正确方向上有限的一小步。
vi. 呼吁，恳求；上诉；诉诸，求助；有吸引力，迎合爱好；（体育比赛中）诉诸裁判 n. 呼吁，请求；吸引力，感染力；上诉；诉诸裁判 vt. 将…上诉，对…上诉 同义词:attract, clamour for, asking, request, motion, charm to appeal a case to a higher tribunal把案件向高一级法院上诉
adj. 荒废的，要塌似的；破坏的 v. 变得荒废（dilapidate的过去分词） 同义词:destructive, obsolescent The building had been dilapidated by neglect.这座大楼因失修而圮毁。
adj. 疯狂的；狂热的，着迷的 同义词:wild, possessed, mad, enthusiastic, insane The bond markets would go crazy otherwise .否则，债券市场将上演疯狂走势。
vt. 娱乐；招待；怀抱；容纳 vi. 款待 同义词:serve, invite, attend, contain, accept, welcome in to entertain children with funny stories给孩子们讲有趣的故事
n. 线索；（故事等的）情节 vt. 为…提供线索；为…提供情况 同义词:action, plot, scenario Nobody clued us to this mystery.没有人向我们提供解开这个奥秘的线索。
n. 外貌，外观；出现，露面 同义词:occurrence, aspect, emergence, external, outside That was also her final appearance on TV .那也是她在电视中最后一次演出。
vi. 追溯；沿路走 vt. 追踪，查探；描绘；回溯 n. 痕迹，踪迹；微量；[仪] 迹线；缰绳 同义词:go back, carry up, represent, figure, trail, suggestion, mark, tail, drop The murderer was traced to Paris.那个凶手被追踪到巴黎。
vt. 题写；题献；铭记；雕 同义词:brand, heart to inscribe one's name on the gravestone将某人的名字刻在墓碑上
vi. 计算；以为；作打算 vt. 计算；预测；认为；打算 同义词:figure, cast, expect, propose, forecast, cast, find We must first calculate the horse-power needed to propel the ship.我们必须首先计算出驱动这艘船需要多大马力。

adv. 谨慎地；小心地 同义词:carefully, deliberately Boy is also discreetly fixed in the context of Japan 's recent history , in a way which again may be read as a response to Ozu .《少年》也被谨慎地限定在日本近代历史的情境之中，这一做法又一次可被解读为是对小津的回应。
vt. 使喜欢；使高兴，使满意 vi. 讨人喜欢；令人高兴 int. 请（礼貌用语） 同义词:glad, satisfy, ace in, prithee The girl in the shop is always eager to please every customer.这位女店员总是很热心地对待每一位顾客。

vt. 安装；使……适应；使……合身；与……相符 vi. 符合，配合；适合；合身 adj. 健康的；合适的；恰当的；准备好的 n. 合身；发作；痉挛 同义词:fix, configure, cooperate, gear, serve, accord, meet with, healthy, applicable, fixed, robust, becoming, outbreak, episodes Let the punishment fit the crime.量刑判罪。
n. 微弱的闪光，瞬息的一现 adj. 闪闪发光的 v. 闪烁， 隐约地闪现（gleam的ing形式） 同义词:glittering, sparkling, shining, flicking We saw the lights of the little town gleaming in the distance.我们看到远处小镇的灯光在闪烁。
adj. 综合的；广泛的；有理解力的 n. 综合学校；专业综合测验 同义词:extensive, integrated, synthetic, widespread, general We have a rather comprehensive subway system here .我们这儿有相当广泛的地铁系统。
adj. 值得尊敬的；人格高尚的；相当数量的 n. 可敬的人 同义词:venerable, honourable We often read in novels how a seemingly respectable person or family has some terrible secret .在小说中，我们经常读到一个表面上受人尊重的人物或家庭，却有着骇人听闻的秘密。
n. 挫折 同义词:setback, clawback Still , they avoided the limelight , much to the frustration of aviation enthusiasts excited by snippets of news .他们依旧避开聚光灯，让引颈期盼片断消息的飞行热中份子感到挫折。
vi. 争论，辩论；提出理由 vt. 辩论，争论；证明；说服 同义词:debate, dispute about, debate, discuss, demonstrate, prove, satisfy He argued in favour of capital punishment.他提出理由赞成严惩。
adv. 感情上；情绪上；令人激动地；情绪冲动地 同义词:thrillingly, breathtakingly Dyslexia can also affect a person emotionally .诵读困难还会影响人的情绪。
adj. 缺乏的；吝啬的；仅有的；稀疏的 同义词:tight, lacking, scarce His head was large and ugly ; he had pale scanty hair and an earthy skin .他的脑袋大而丑，头发灰白稀疏，土色的皮肤。
adj. 古怪的，反常的 n. 古怪的人 同义词:abnormal, odd, curious, fantastic, weirdo She cannot just be written off as an eccentric recluse .不能仅仅把她当成一个古怪的隐居者。
n. 肯恩（男名） Hi , Ken . What are you reading ?你好，肯。你在读什么？
adj. 根深的；积习的；成癖的 同义词:deeply rooted They were inveterate hoarders . Their motto was obviously " Waste not, want not ".这是些积习很深的贮藏家。他们的箴言显然就是“不浪费，无缺愁”。
adv. 微弱地；模糊地；虚弱地 同义词:thin, feebly She fainted away with the shock of the news.她听到这个消息后震惊得晕过去了。

vt. 开始；启动 vi. 出发 n. 开始；起点 同义词:institute, initiate, leave, set out, go forth into, sally out, set off/out, beginning, threshold, opening, conception, fresh The bus will start at 7:30 tomorrow morning.汽车将于明晨7时30分准时开出。
n. 通信；一致；相当 同义词:accordance, communication, unity, agreement, identity Hardly less enjoyment and insight are to be got from Adams ' s correspondence .我们还可以从亚当斯的书信里得到同样的乐趣和洞见。
vt. 代表；表现；描绘；回忆；再赠送 vi. 代表；提出异议 同义词:conduct oneself, bear oneself, trace, figure, to stand for, stand for sth This mark represents a village.这个符号表示村庄。
adv. 事实上，几乎；实质上 同义词:actually, really, almost, nearly, most Direct criticism of leaders is still virtually taboo in China .在中国，直接批评领导人实际上依然是禁忌。
n. 木材；木制品；树林 vi. 收集木材 vt. 植林于；给…添加木柴 同义词:timber, lignum It can burn wood , animal waste or crop waste.它可以燃烧木料，动物粪便或庄稼秸秆。
n. 出生；血统，出身；起源 同义词:origin, extraction, blood, stem, stock the day her mother birthed her她母亲生她的那一天

adj. 建筑学的；建筑上的；符合建筑法的 The show also includes some of Wright 's drawings , architectural models and photographs .这次展览还展出了赖特的部分设计图、建筑设计模型和照片。
n. 丛林，密林；危险地带 adj. 丛林的；蛮荒的 同义词:mott, chaparral, backwoods This jungle must be cleared .这片丛林必须清理。
vt. 反映；反射，照出；反省 vi. 反射，映现；深思 同义词:glass, image, give back, flash back The high wall reflects sounds.这面高墙将声音反射回来。
adj. 难以置信的，惊人的 同义词:tremendous, unbelievable, spectacular, fabulous No one who isn't directly involved would ever believe the incredible duplication and futility .不直接卷入的人没有一个会相信这种不可置信的重复和徒劳。

n. 自动化；自动操作 同义词:robotization, automatic operation Semantic descriptions of device capabilities and functionality will let us achieve such automation with minimal human intervention.以语意描述设备的性能和功能，将会让我们获得最高的自动化结果。
n. 离开；出发；违背 同义词:leaving, starting, violation, breach, quit Usually two hours before the flight departure .通常在飞机起飞前两个小时。
n. [建] 隔间；区划；卧车上的小客房 vt. 分隔；划分 同义词:to divide, measure off Six people were travelling in a compartment on a train .有六个人搭乘火车旅行，坐在同一车厢内。
n. 情况；实例；箱 vt. 包围；把…装于容器中 同义词:situation, circumstance, instance, thing, condition, invest, circumvent All the books have been cased for shipping.所有书籍已经装箱待运。
vt. 建议；打算，计划；求婚 vi. 建议；求婚；打算 同义词:schedule, design, map, think, purpose, aim, offer What do you propose we do?你建议我们做什么?
n. 养蜂人 同义词:hiver, apiarist A beekeeper has been called in to take care of the problem .该镇请来一名养蜂人来解决这个问题。

n. 恶梦；梦魇般的经历 adj. 可怕的；噩梦似的 同义词:paroniria, oneirodynia, terrible, horrible, awesome, fearful, dire The film starts with an intentionally disturbing nightmare sequence involving a pack of rabid dogs , which represents the invasion .影片有意以扰乱的噩梦情境为开端，梦境中包括一群象征着入侵的狂犬。
n. 冠军；标题；头衔；权利；字幕 vt. 加标题于；赋予头衔；把…称为 adj. 冠军的；标题的；头衔的 同义词:rights, champion, honor, first, heading, repute, titular She hasn't titled her article.她还没给自己的文章加标题。
n. 回水；死水；停滞不进的状态或地方 同义词:standing water, dead water He backwatered on his promise.他背弃了诺言。
n. 攻击；抨击；疾病发作 vt. 攻击；抨击；动手干 vi. 攻击；腐蚀 同义词:attempt, push, have at, come at, eat, have at to attack the enemy攻打敌人
adv. 建设性地 In Bali , Beijing was repeatedly praised for engaging constructively .在巴厘会议上，中国多次因积极参与而受到表扬。
adj. 未预见到的，无法预料的 同义词:unexpectable You must make a liberal allowance unforeseen circumstances .你必须充分考虑到预料不到的情况。
adv. 急切地；渴望地；热心地 同义词:urgently, enthusiastically The children eagerly learn something new from the teacher every day .孩子们每天都渴望从老师身上学习新事物。

n. 功率；力量；能力；政权；势力；[数] 幂 vt. 激励；供以动力；使…有力量 vi. 快速前进 adj. 借影响有权势人物以操纵权力的 同义词:strength, ability, competence, regime, force, stimulate, bestir, make good time The aircraft is powered by three jet engines.这架飞机由三台喷气发动机驱动。
art. 这；那 adv. 更加（用于比较级，最高级前） I bought a car yesterday. The car is very expensive.我昨天买了一辆小汽车，这辆车很贵。
item.phonetic: [辅音前读作 ðə; 元音前和j-; hi-; he-; hə-前常读作ði; 罕强'ði; ,ði; 强ði:; 在元音前有时用作弱式; 元音前弱 ði; 辅音前弱 ðə; ð]

item.trans: n. 总统；董事长；校长 同义词:principal, prez We know how strongly president feels that he is right .我们知道总统多么坚定地认为自己是正确的。
vt. 卸下…；解除…的负担 vi. 打开包裹 He unpacked the doll carefully from its box.他小心地将玩偶从盒中取出来。
n. 壁炉 同义词:andiron, chimney place They usually hang up their stockings on the fireplace to wait for Santa Clause .他们通常把他们的长袜子挂在壁炉上等待圣诞老人。
n. 争论，争辩；争夺；论点 同义词:thesis, combat The division of their father's property is their bone of contention .他们父亲财产分配的问题是他们争吵的原因。
n. 发抖；战栗；担心 adj. 发抖的；战栗的；哆嗦的 v. 颤抖（tremble的ing形式）；战悚 同义词:worry, fear, vibrant, atremble, quivering The girl trembled all over.女孩浑身颤抖。
adj. 外面的，外部的；远离中心的 n. 环外命中 同义词:outside, external, out Then come the outer ranks : Dominations , Virtues and Powers .接下来是外围的主天使、能天使、力天使；
n. 打赌，赌注；被打赌的事物 vt. 打赌；敢断定，确信 vi. 打赌 同义词:stake, make sure, be sure of, lay, stake I bet he'll be late.我断定他要迟到。
adj. 不需要的；有害的；讨厌的；空闲的 同义词:harmful, available, evil, leisure, off I did so and sent my niece a gift card to replace the unwanted " present .我收回了我的礼物，送了张礼品卡以替代那个不受欢迎的礼物。
vt. 使平静；使安静；哄骗 vi. 平息；减弱；停止 n. 间歇；暂停；暂时平静 同义词:calm, silence, compose, fall, lower, cool, subside, hang, pause Mother lulled the child to sleep.母亲哄孩子入睡。
n. 瓷器 adj. 瓷制的 同义词:porcelain ware, stoneware, porcelain China hit back over the weekend .中国上周末进行了反击。

n. 瑕疵，裂纹；缺点；一阵狂风 vt. 使无效；使破裂，使有缺陷 vi. 生裂缝，变的有缺陷 同义词:checking, defect, deficiency, vice, fault, crack, fracture The failure to reduce oil dependence is not the only flaw in the ethanol program .降低对石油依赖失败的原因不是因为乙醇项目存在问题。
adj. 废弃不用的 v. 废弃（disuse的过去分词） 同义词:antiquated some disused traditional customs一些已废弃的传统风俗习惯
adj. 舒适的，舒服的 n. 盖被 同义词:pleasant, easy, cozy Very comfortable and quiet .很舒服，也很安静。
n. 关系；叙述；故事；亲属关系 同义词:connection, statement, bearing, concern, story The relation between unemployment and inflation has also weakened .失业和通胀之间的联系也被削弱了。
vt. 缺乏；不足；没有；需要 vi. 缺乏；不足；没有 n. 缺乏；不足 同义词:ask, claim, fail, low in, shortage, short of, deficiency, need, drought The committee lacked a correct estimate of his ability.委员会对他的能力缺乏正确的评价。
vt. 赚，赚得；获得，挣得；使得到；博得 同义词:acquire, buy, find, make, score to earn one's living谋生
n. 幕；窗帘 vt. 遮蔽；装上门帘 同义词:screen, window hangings, shadow, shield I have enough material to curtain all the windows.我有足够的料子把所有的窗户都挂上窗帘。
adv. 自信地；安心地 同义词:assertorically, securely Dr Davy confidently bats away some obvious doubts about the results .戴维博士极有信心的驳斥了对实验结果的明显怀疑。
vi. 抓住；格斗；抓斗机 vt. 抓住；与…格斗 n. 抓住；格斗 同义词:take hold, clutch at, grasp, noble, collar, grasp, melee to grapple a boat to a wharf with a steel hook用铁锚将船固定在码头上
n. 薄片，纸张；薄板；床单 vt. 覆盖；盖上被单；使成大片 vi. 成片流动；大片落下 adj. 片状的 同义词:slice, laminae, invest, house, roof, cap, lamellate to sheet a bed在床上铺上床单
vt. 区分；辨别；使杰出，使表现突出 vi. 区别，区分；辨别 同义词:tell apart, differentiate, differentiate, tell from She was distinguished from the other girls by her height.她身材高挑有别于其他女孩。

adv. 越来越多地；渐增地 同义词:pyramidally, cumulatively And many see the current UN conference as the last chance to shore up increasingly threadbare nuclear non - proliferation treaty .而在许多人看来，本次联合国会议是支持越来越显得陈腐的“核不扩散条约”的最后机会。
adj. 难达到的；难接近的；难见到的 IT IS usually agreed that casinos should , in the public interest , be inaccessible and expensive .大家通常认为，为了保证公共利益，应该提高赌场的门槛和成本。
vi. 突袭，猛扑 vt. 扑过去抓住 n. 猛扑，爪 同义词:sweep down, bound on, talon, unguis We hid himself behind the bushes, ready to pounce on the intruder.我们藏在灌木丛后，准备向来犯者发起突然袭击。
adj. 不表同情的；不同情的 British law is broadly unsympathetic to such notions .英国法律通常不赞成这些主张。
n. 超额；超量；不平衡 vt. 使失去均衡；使过重 vi. 失去平衡 同义词:excess, imbalance, lose one's balance, out of balance to overbalance a bowl跌落一只碗
adv. 同样地；类似于 同义词:equally, same, as, likewise Similarly , a condensate moves along a magnetic matter waveguide as a beam of matter .同样地，凝聚态以物质波束的型态能顺著磁性物质波导移动。
n. 行李；[交] 辎重（军队的） 同义词:luggage, belonging Is this all your baggage , sir ?这就是您的全部行李吗？先生？
n. 印刷业；印花布；印刷字体；印章；印记 vt. 印刷；打印；刊载；用印刷体写；在…印花样 vi. 印刷；出版；用印刷体写 同义词:impression, seal, strike off, bring out, get out The mark of a man's shoe was clearly printed in the mud.一个男人的鞋印清楚地印在湿地上。
vt. 编译；编制；编辑；[图情] 汇编 同义词:to edit, copy-edit It often takes five or six years of hard work to compile a good dictionary.编一部好的词典常常需要苦干五六年。
vi. 累积；积聚 vt. 积攒 同义词:store up, scrape up to accumulate great wealth by hard work靠勤劳积攒大量财富
vt. 掘；舀取；抢先获得；搜集 n. 勺；铲子；独家新闻；凹处 同义词:pick, dip, recession, cavity to scoop some salt out of the jar从盐罐中舀出一些盐
n. 拜伦（男子名） Now the rat of Panic was gnawing at Byron 's spirit .如今恐慌正象耗子一样在啃啮拜伦的心灵。
vt. 致力；献身；题献 同义词:give oneself, devote to The ancient Greeks dedicated many shrines to Aphrodite.古希腊人以许多神殿供奉(爱与美的女神)阿佛洛狄特。
n. 放松；缓和；消遣 同义词:entertainment, occupation, recreation Relaxation methods , such as meditation , are useful ways to bring your emotions into balance .放松的方法，例如：沉思，是有用的方法来让你的感情出于平衡。
adj. 顺利的；光滑的；平稳的 vt. 使光滑；消除（障碍等）；使优雅；缓和 n. 平滑部分；一块平地 vi. 变平静；变平滑 adv. 光滑地；平稳地；流畅地 同义词:glabrous, favourable, eliminate, avoid, relax, quietly, glossily to smooth a piece of wood把一块木料刮平
n. 技工，机修工 adj. 手工的 同义词:servicemen, technical worker, manual, handmade I took it to mechanic yesterday .我昨天把它拿到修理工那里去了。
n. [海洋] 深度；深奥 同义词:profoundity, deepness Even a single flower , in depth of winter , is a miracle and a symbol of hope .在严冬季节，鲜花即使是一枝独秀，也是一种奇迹和希望的象征。
adj. 亲爱的；尊敬的；昂贵的 adv. 高价地；疼爱地 int. 哎呀 n. 亲爱的人 同义词:loving, expensive, rich, costly, oh, my, ohone, machree Look , dear . Do you like the beautiful moon ?看，亲爱的。你喜欢美丽的月亮吗？

adv. 自动地；机械地；无意识地 adj. 不经思索的 同义词:voluntarily, mechanically The orthodox view was that investment adjusts to the full employment level automatically via the rate of interest .传统的观点认为，通过利息率可使投资自动地调整实现充分就业的水平。
vt. 核实；查证 同义词:touch bottom, check on Later,findings verified the scientist's theory.后来的发现证实了这位科学家的理论。
n. 阶段；舞台；戏剧；驿站 vt. 举行；上演；筹划 vi. 举行；适于上演；乘驿车旅行 同义词:drama, phase, age, grade, theater, celebrate, put on, come off, to hold A new hit drama will be stagged next week.一部新的具轰动效应的话剧将于下星期上演。
n. 巫术；魔法；戏法 adj. 不可思议的；有魔力的；魔术的 同义词:medicine, witchcraft, wizardry, mysterious, fantastic, miraculous Or some other digital black - magic box ?或其他一些数字黑色魔术匣？

n. 精制；文雅；[化工][油气][冶] 提纯 同义词:cultivation, purification Bill Venners : You say , "Don't spoil a perfectly good program by over- embellishment and over- refinement . " How do I know when to stop ?比尔·凡纳斯：你们说：“过度修饰或者过度精炼会毁掉一个足够好的软件。”我怎么才能知道何时该停止？

vt. 需要；希望；应该；缺少 n. 需要；缺乏；贫困；必需品 vi. 需要；缺少 同义词:ask, would have, claim, necessity, shortage, need, poverty, deficiency, wish, have need of Don't you think that her jacket wants an inch or so of the proper length?你不觉得她的夹克短一寸左右吗?
n. 味道；品味；审美 vt. 尝；体验 vi. 尝起来；有…的味道 同义词:uner, aesthetic appreciation, experience, degustate Please taste this to see if you like it.请尝尝这个，看看你喜不喜欢。

n. 初学者，学习者 同义词:novice, beginner If the learner guesses a partial answer the weak teacher can give a hint of " getting warm, " or "getting cold " to help the learner along.如果学生猜出了部分答案，能力弱的老师能给出暗示“接近”，或“偏离”，从侧面帮助学生。
n. 地点；位置；场所 vt. 设置；为…选址 同义词:location, spot, situation, where, lie, intercalate, instal to site a new building为新建楼房选址

adj. 直接的；直系的；亲身的；恰好的 vt. 管理；指挥；导演；指向 vi. 指导；指挥 adv. 直接地；正好；按直系关系 同义词:immediate, right, manage, conduct, run, officer, control, supervise, to command, immediately, straight, just, fair The general manager directed the company through a difficult time.总经理带领公司渡过了难关。
n. 锡；罐头，罐；马口铁 adj. 锡制的 vt. 涂锡于；给…包马口铁 同义词:pot, stannum tinned asparagus罐头芦笋
adj. 甘美的；满足感官的 同义词:honey, nectared Sime is not thirty years old , and Madeline 's a luscious girl .西姆还不到三十岁，梅德琳又是个娇艳的姑娘。
n. 允许，许可 同义词:allows, liberty, leave South Carolina will soon do so , if it can get permission from the feds .如果能获得联邦许可的话，南卡罗来纳州也将很快依此实行。
n. 搜索者；检查官 同义词:inquisitionist You could say that I am an avid Searcher of Truth .你可以说我是一个渴望真相的探索者。
vt. 拆除；取消；解散；除掉…的覆盖物 vi. 可拆卸 同义词:recall, demolish to dismantle a fortress拆除防御工事
adv. 急剧地；锐利地 同义词:keenly, trenchantly In the fourth quarter of last year euro-area GDP growth slowed sharply , to only 1.2%.去年第四季度，欧元区国内生产总值增长急剧放缓，降低到仅为1.2%。
adj. 原始的，远古的；简单的，粗糙的 n. 原始人 同义词:original, simple, crude, plain, rough, Euroman This epic extolled the founder of this primitive tribe .这部史诗歌颂了这个原始部落的创始人。
vi. 加快；变活跃；进入胎动期 vt. 加快；鼓舞；使复活 同义词:step on the juice, stimulate, lift, spirit, inspire We have to quicken our pace.我们必须加快步伐。
adv. 逆流地；向上游 adj. 向上游的；逆流而上的 n. 上游部门 同义词:upwards " With crude prices at these levels, it pays to have a greater upstream presence , " he says.他表示：“在原油价格如此之高的情况下，增强上游业务是值得的。”
adj. 无形的，看不见的；无形的；不显眼的，暗藏的 同义词:intangible, discarnate, aeriform He questioned Adam Smith 's emphasis on the invisible hand .他对亚当·史密斯对“无形的手”的强调表示怀疑。
adj. 颠簸的；崎岖不平的 同义词:jouncy, jolty Fasten your seat belts. It's going to be a bumpy night .系好安全带啊，夜路会很难走的/夜路会很颠簸的。
adv. 富情感地；多情地 I miss the good old days , ' she added sentimentally .‘我怀念过去那些美好的日子，’她动情地补充道。
n. 名声，名誉；声望 同义词:credit, name, fame, celebrity, prestige Typical of the Scotch , Burns had a reputation for being funny and charming .彭斯是一名典型的苏格兰人，以有趣和有魅力而闻名。
n. 种类；方式；品质 vi. 分类；协调；交往 vt. 将…分类；将…排序；挑选出某物 同义词:category, manner, way of, variety, kind, mode, nature, travel, company, mix, associate, concert, systematize to sort apples by grade按等级把苹果分类
vt. 使吃惊 同义词:take aback, take by surprise It amazed me (to learn) that she had been promoted.听说她提升了，真使我惊愕。
n. 鱼苗；油炸食物 vt. 油炸；油煎 vi. 油炸；油煎 同义词:deep-fry, panbroil, deepfry I always fry potatoes in hot fat with a bit of onion.我用热油炒土豆时总是加少些洋葱。
n. 线，细绳；一串，一行 vt. 扎，缚；使排成一列，串起；伸展，拉直 vi. 连成一串；排成一列 同义词:thread, linea, spread, pink to string a bonnet系上扁软帽的带子
vt. 驱散，驱逐；消除（烦恼等） 同义词:eliminate, avoid The sun dispelled the dense fog.太阳驱散了浓雾。
n. 短语, 习语, 措辞, [音]乐句 vt. 措词, 将(乐曲)分成乐句 同义词:idiom, diction He phrased his criticisms in careful terms.他的批评用词十分谨慎。
adj. 相当大的；重要的，值得考虑的 同义词:crucial, important, material, big, major That merchant stacked up considerable profits in a few months .那个商人在几个月内就积聚起大量利润。
vi. 道歉；辩解；赔不是 vt. 道歉；谢罪；辩白 同义词:square oneself, make an apology, square oneself, make an apology She apologized for accusing him falsely.她为错误地咒骂他而道歉。
vt. 扰乱；使…混乱；使…心绪不宁 同义词:disorder, upset She is very perturbed about her husband's health.她为丈夫的健康而不安。
n. 黎明；开端 vt. 破晓；出现；被领悟 同义词:morning, origin, come out, break of day The day dawned with a cloudless sky.东方发白，晴空万里无云。
n. 布，织物；餐巾 同义词:web, woven fabric They pretended to take the cloth off the loom .他们装做把布料从织机上取下来。

n. 主题；科目；[语] 主语；国民 adj. 服从的；易患…的；受制于…的 vt. 使…隶属；使屈从于… 同义词:topic, theme, nation, titles, motive, followed, compliant It is a bounden duty for a soldier to be subjected to the orders.服从命令是军人的天职。

n. 城邦 同义词:polis The tour ends where the world 's smallest city-state begins .旅行在世界最小的城邦开始之处结束。

n. 内容，目录；满足；容量 adj. 满意的 vt. 使满足 同义词:satisfaction, directory, bulk, list, fill, satisfactory, well-pleasing, gratify, appease Two glasses of beer contented him.两杯啤酒就使他心满意足了。
